website_summaries.verdict: Skechers may not be dominating the technologically-infused footwear, but when it comes with style, comfort, and fit, they certainly know how to up their game. Those with or without foot issues undoubtedly enjoy all of its features, from how lightweight it is, how aggressive the tread is, and how it doesn't require a break-in period. For a very affordable price of $65, men can already enjoy casual dress shoe that can take them to different occasions without the hassle.
pros: Because many are satisfied consumers of the Skechers Superior – Levoy, they opted on buying a second or third pair
Diabetics are well-pleased with these sneakers because they finally found comfortable footwear that fits the needs of their feet
The tread of the shoe works excellently with wet or dry surfaces
One notes that other than dress shoes, these are the only pair that he wears
Numerous consumers who have wide feet are delighted with the Relaxed Fit line as they feel incredibly comfortable especially across the toe box
A couple of shoppers mention that these are well worth the money
The inner sole is exceptionally soft, according to various testers
These shoes are extremely lightweight according to a few purchasers
One particularly likes the no stretch laces
A high percentage of online reviewers find the Skechers Relaxed Fit: Superior – Levoy extremely comfortable

Several of the shoppers say that after a moderate amount of wear, the insoles are still in great shape, the insides of the shoe do not smell, the body of the footwear still looks brand new, there is no break-in period required, and no side walls are leaning
It exudes the feeling of a sneaker but has the look of a casual dress shoe
cons: One said that, although it is not such a significant flaw, these sneakers are not as breathable as he would like
The color of the leather in the front and sides are entirely inconsistent
The front is darker because there are two overlapping layers of leather which breaks the color harmony of the shoe
The tongue of the Skechers Levoy drifts off to the side after walking for a short distance, according to one tester
Some of the users experience quality issues like eyelets and the sides being torn after a short period of wear

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shame that after 6 months of wearing these shoes, for sitting at a desk at work or strolling into town, they have completely fallen into pieces. Not expected from a product from this brand, VERY DISAPPOINTED... And don't seem to be able to contact/talk to the vendor about it either as it has gone over the time limit... I do not call this very good customer service either...
customer_reviews.author: Ms. A. Stocklauser

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but really poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, but after wearing them for one week I've had to super glue the inside because the insole material around the memory foam was coming away, and now the pull up tag on the back is coming out after only using that about 4 or 5 times. These are completely not worth the money. I'd end up buying 2 pairs a month at this rate and I only walk about half an hour a day. I really wouldn't recommend for quality. I'm going to contact Amazon about the replacement policy on this garbage. A real shame because they are very comfortable and easy to walk in. Very shock absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: iZian

customer_reviews.title: so the shoes feel great but they wore through within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Sole is very lightweight, almost foam rubber, so the shoes feel great but they wore through within 6 months. I was getting bits of stone stuck in the sole and even a small piece of glass was found to be working its way through. A real shame because the lightness made them extremely comfortable but durability was completely sacrificed. Probably fine to wear around the office but I wouldn't go outside too often with them.
customer_reviews.author: SwiftInitiative

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: For one, majority of the Skechers here on Amazon are a lot cheaper than from Skechers' official website. I've been wanting some smart/casual shoes for work, but needed the soft insoles just like my Skechers trainers. So far, these Oxfords have been wonderful to walk and stand in. I'll report back on the general wear/tear over time, but for the price, I'm very pleased with these pairs of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: These are without doubt the most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever owned. The memory foam sole is a God send, allowing long treks around town to pass without needing to rest them. The design too is really nice. Only downside is they do crease very easily, and I even noticed some white powder building up in the creases. I brushed this off and put some coconut oil I had lying around into the dry areas and it seemed to solve the problem. I think this was after wearing them in the rain, which woudl explain it.
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe - but you may want to order the next size down?
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. Not quite as 'bouncy' as previous Sketchers I've had, but with insoles, a comfortable wear. After 3 months of daily use the front edges are showing some wear but I have used the shoes on dusty trail paths. A versatile, good looking, lightweight shoe. Reasonably priced. Size 12 were too large for me (a first!) but no problem exchanging for the size 11 which fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: My partner wanted a pair of comfortable shoes for work and these work wonders for his ...
customer_reviews.text: My partner wanted a pair of comfortable shoes for work and these work wonders for his feet, he is so impressed by them that his feet doesnt hurt when working. Would certainly recommend if on your feet all day
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great - buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light-weight, shock-absorbing, yet remains a stylish, quality product. So comfy, you almost can't feel them on your feet! Use them all the time to do long walks to work and they are still going strong after months of wear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Fit my clown feet
customer_reviews.text: Look good and fit really well (I have wide, size 13 feet). These are comfy and plenty of room for my clown feet.
customer_reviews.author: Howard A

customer_reviews.title: & would like to return them
customer_reviews.text: after purchasing this product for my partner for christmas (welcome surprise) and only wearing these shoe,s for short periods for the last 7months they have started to fall apart around the eyeletts, & would like to return them. As the quality of this product is not to your usual standard, I look forward to hearing from yourselves to solve this problem many thanks. ms selina gable
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Not even had these 1 year and hardly wore them and the grey colored grip is falling off the shoe. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: fireblazer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: as always with Skechers, very comfy. The fit is perfect for me, they look great and served me well on a full day/night wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Clivvy

customer_reviews.title: ... front You tell me how long the guarantee is love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I hope you can help I have had the shoes for six months and coming away at the front You tell me how long the guarantee is love the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has quite wide feet, but he finds these very very comfortable, extremely pleased. He has worn them every day since they arrived. They look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. P. Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for walking in
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for walking in, however, one of the bottom decorative inserts of the sole has come off and required gluing
customer_reviews.author: hazel

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style come as Standard
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a person who bought shoes because of the brand, but having bought a pair of Skechers Memory Foam shoes, I couldn't wait to get another pair. They are as good as I expected, and my knee pain has noticeably reduced.
customer_reviews.author: MR J VARDY

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: After less than three months intermittent use one of the top lace eyelets has ripped. I've never had this issue with other styles of Skechers shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaivee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: look good but are a lot bigger than other sketchers in same size.
customer_reviews.author: Telenor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - Ordered size 11, needed to exchange for size 10
customer_reviews.text: I seem to be sometimes 10 or 11 (I even own size 12 trainers). I originally bought size 11 but exchanged (hassle free transaction) for size 10 - they fit great. Smart, lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: bo34

customer_reviews.title: If you like this style of casual yet acceptably smart shoes I would recommend that you try them
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and if bought at a price below Recommended Retail Value good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Colin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pairs of Sketcher trainers and these are the lightest and most comfortable of them all
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit. Will take a little wearing bit they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Knalse

customer_reviews.title: Smart comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my trainers they fit very well so soft they are like slippers on . I put them on straight away and they were so comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that you forget you are wearing
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight shoes, ever so comfortable! My only grumble is the sol;es don't seem to be very hard wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Evans

customer_reviews.title: ... as you'd expect from Sketchers and they look really smart. Perfect for wearing in the office
customer_reviews.text: As comfy as you'd expect from Sketchers and they look really smart. Perfect for wearing in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pawinski

customer_reviews.title: Comfy fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are simply great you don't know you are wearing them. I would definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: John Stone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable like walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, very comfortable and perfect for my wide feet. Very soft with the memory foam. Perfect for standing long periods of time or walking.
customer_reviews.author: GNV

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light for use all day at work! Size fitted as expected.
customer_reviews.author: robert hodges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Typical skechers shoes super fit very comfortable could wear them all day sometimes forget i have them on
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dale

customer_reviews.title: Leather split
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes but upper split after only 7 months of very light wear.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnicut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had these shoes before and they are extremely comfortable and a brilliant fit.
customer_reviews.author: R1

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish & comfy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves everything about these shoes and particularly the lightweight feature. They are both stylish and substantial for everyday use as well as for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Drinkwater

customer_reviews.title: ... Skechers} was slightly too large - Size 11 was perfect. Exchange handled perfectly by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Size 12 {previously OK from Skechers} was slightly too large - Size 11 was perfect. Exchange handled perfectly by Amazon. Really light, good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: rodah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected an excellent product delivered on time all I can say is job well done
customer_reviews.author: TONY BRIDDON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable no need to wear them in. I would recommend to anybody, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good value, comfortable shoe..
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, look smartly casual, fit well without any uncomfortable 'wearing in' and a good price for the quality of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sketchers and Delivery
customer_reviews.text: They are Only a week old, but very comfortable with the memory foam inner and very light. Overall I am very pleased with them. Amazon delivered extremely quickly, as always, so I must say I very impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Lanes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have more than one pair of these they are so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really light shoes that looks good. Comfortable fit for a wide foot
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoes at a fantastic price. overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: irfan

customer_reviews.title: Worn Sketchers for around 10 years. These are the most comfortable pair to date.
customer_reviews.text: Worn Sketchers for around 10 years. These are the most comfortable pair to date.
customer_reviews.author: Richard John Stansmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my shoes,perfect fit and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pine

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend them to all
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight and very confortably. Would recommend them to all.
customer_reviews.author: a j smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality is really bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 3 month ago. It was comfortable while walking but It did not last for more than 2 month and it got a cut in the leather in the side next to the stitching. I was not even using it heavily. I regret buying it specially I was expecting it to be far much better. I do not recommend this product for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Saleh

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these. Very light and comfy and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. Very light and comfy and cheaper than store prices.
customer_reviews.author: Tin_Tacks

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended for daily use (4h+), inner heel lining got torn in less than 4 weeks. They do look nice and are quite comfortable to wear but definitely not made to last. Memory foam has almost no impact on comfort, just put there for marketing purposes, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Skechers Superior Levoy, Men's Oxford
product_meta.description: Versatile style and supreme comfort combine in the skechers relaxed fit and reg;: superior - levoy shoe. Smooth leather upper in a lace up dress casual bicycle toe oxford with stitching and overlay accents. Memory foam insole.
feature_bullets: The Sketchers Levoy is a simple very lightweight comfortable every day shoe for work or play.
